H3.text: where did emperor hirohito live. Japan

A4.text: Hirohito was born on 29 April 1901 at Tōgū Palace in Aoyama, Tokyo during the reign of his grandfather, Emperor Meiji

A5.text: He was the 124th emperor of Japan according to the traditional order of succession, reigning from 1926 until his death in 1989
